content: Return back to the previous courtyard, and this time follow the blood trail to head up the left path. There will be a few Daoists trying to block your path, and once you head up the second set of stairs, be ready for an ambush on the right by a Snake Herbalist.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Return back to the previous courtyard, and this time follow the blood trail to head up the left path. There will be a few Daoists trying to block your path, and once you head up the second set of stairs, be ready for an ambush on the right by a Snake Herbalist.
